page.title: 05Farm crops - Wheat & Barley
page.content: {WHEAT: Wheat is the grain most widely used for making bread, so it is a very important crop. Wheat is grown on farms, the ear is ground for bread and biscuits.Wheat is also made into some animal food.The straw at the bottom of the ear is used for animal bedding. Sometimes the seeds inside the ear are re _ sown for the following year's crop. {BARLEY:}_ Barley is a cereal grain. There are many different varieties of it but those grown in Great Britain have heads made up of tiny kernels, each of which is enclosed in a sheath or hull. At the tip of the sheath is a long and brittle spike known as awn. Barley is used for making beer. It also provides an important source of animal food.
